short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lego Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Lego background. Lego wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Lego wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Choose or randomize your Lego background from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated search bar using Google.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for rapid access.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with easy access.
12. Simple options for sharing content on social media.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. Instant links to play games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Lego tab.
